targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (le, method, area) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace", area!="health"}[5m])))

sum by (method, area) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", area!="health"}[5m])) / sum by (method, area) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", area!="health"}[5m]))

sum by (method, pod) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", area="health"}[5m])) / sum by (method, pod) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", area="health"}[5m]))

topk(10, sum by (method, area) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", area!="health"}[5m])) / sum by (method, area) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", area!="health"}[5m])))
